interactivity.requirements: Not Saturday or Sunday You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " Kind Of, Yes. Kind Of, No. " from Noriko Nakayama

progression.synopsis: Sensei invites Noriko to his house — she is very happy, while Ami is not. Noriko seems to know more about Sensei's early life than Ami does, and Ami doesn't know whether to be mad or impressed that he once dated Niki Nakayama . Noriko manages to convince Ami that she's nice, although Ami still isn't fully accepting of her. Maya unexpectedly arrives at the house, and everyone agrees that it would be best if Maya and Noriko don't meet — as such, Noriko and Sensei hide while Ami invents a reason why Maya should accompany her back outside.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.14.
